title: Husband refuses to financially support wife's family after they ridiculed his business idea, believes they don't deserve a ‘dime’ of his major profit: ‘They were very unsupportive’
description: All of us have big dreams to make it big in the world and come out of the other end with a heaping pile of cash. That's the American dream, baby! We're told all of our hard work will amount to something grand, and a lot of times, it does. If you're thinking about opening up your own business, make sure you know what you're doing. Success touches those who don't give up (so I'm told), you just have to make sure that you keep a small circle of people around you who support you in your endeavors. If you truly know what you're doing, at least one person will have your back.The guy who posted this story had exactly one person who believed in him and his marketing business—his wife. They had a lengthy discussion about the fact that their income might take a bit of a hit while he's kickstarting the endeavor and she wholeheartedly agreed to the financial compromise. His wife's family, though, is a different story. They would constantly berate him and ridicule his ideas, all the while very forwardly calling him a d*adbeat. So, when his business took off, he made sure they wouldn't see a single cent of his profits. They weren't happy about that, to say the least. Scroll below to get the juice.
author: Lana DeGaetano

html:
Support like this is key to a healthy relationship. Open communication, understanding, and support is what pushes someone to do their best in life—and that's exactly what this guy did.

The guy's family, though, really gave him grief about about he chose to occupy his time and the risk he was taking in exploring this business venture. It's really none of their business, especially when their daughter gave him the solid, loving OK to do so. Just scroll below to see how they backtrack. 

His in-laws don't deserve a single cent after what they've subjected him to since he aired out his business idea. Only now do they want to reap the benefits of his ideas, when they can attend fancy dinners and go on expensive vacations. Not happening, fam. The entitlement is baffling.

Commenters are on this guy's side 100%, and they make sure to let him know that he is, in fact, NTA.
